name: foundryvtt-window-controls
description: Improves Minimized window organization, style and adds Maximize and Pin window buttons

scripts.copy: mkdir -p dist && cp ./windowcontrols.js dist/ && cp ./windowcontrols.css dist/ && cp ./README.md dist/ && cp ./CHANGELOG.md dist/ && cp ./LICENSE.md dist/ && cp ./module.json dist/ && cp ./THANKS.txt dist/ && cp -r ./lang dist/
scripts.copyWin: mkdir dist && copy module.json dist && copy windowcontrols.js dist && copy windowcontrols.css dist && copy README.md dist && copy CHANGELOG.md dist && copy LICENSE.md dist && copy module.json dist && copy THANKS.txt dist && xcopy /Y /I lang dist\lang

author: JeansenVaars (Saif Ellafi)
